AT.name: Sin & Punishment™
AT.description: Ein weiteres Meisterwerk der Spielentwicklung aus dem Hause Treasure, das als eines der großartigsten Shooter aller Zeiten gilt. Sin and Punishment™ fordert dein Geschick als junger Widerstandskämpfer heraus. Du bekämpfst die Ruffians – Mutanten, die zum Verzehr gezüchtet wurden und sich jetzt gegen ihre Schöpfer erhoben haben – und nimmst es zudem mit korrupten Soldaten auf, während du versuchst, den Planeten zu retten. Nachdem das Original von Sin and Punishment nur in Japan für Nintendo 64™ erhältlich war, wurde diese Version speziell für Virtual Console™ auf einen neueren Stand gebracht. So verfügt sie über englische Menü- und Trainingstexte sowie englische Untertitel in der Schlusssequenz. Wenn du diesen Titel bereits auf deiner Wii™ erworben hast, führe einen System-Transfer von deiner Wii auf deine Wii U™ durch, um ein Upgrade-Sonderangebot zu erhalten. Dieses Spiel unterstützt auch Japanisch. Hierbei handelt es sich um die US-Version des Spiels.

AU.name: Sin & Punishment™
AU.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet. Originally released only in Japan for Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment is available once again via Virtual Console™, updated with English menu and tutorial text, and English subtitles in the ending sequence. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This game also supports Japanese. This is the US version of the game.

BG.name: Sin & Punishment™
BG.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet. Originally released only in Japan for Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment is available once again via Virtual Console™, updated with English menu and tutorial text, and English subtitles in the ending sequence. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This game also supports Japanese. This is the US version of the game.

BE.name: Sin & Punishment™
BE.description: Les génies de Treasure sont à l'origine de ce chef-d'œuvre de conception de jeu qui se démarque comme l'un des meilleurs jeux de tir de tous les temps. Dans Sin and Punishment™, vous incarnez un jeune guerrier qui se bat contre les Ruffians, des mutants créés artificiellement pour faire face à la diminution des ressources alimentaires qui se sont retournés contre leurs maîtres. Vous devrez également affronter des forces militaires corrompues dans votre bataille pour sauver la planète. Initialement sorti uniquement au Japon pour Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment est de nouveau disponible via la console virtuelle. Il a été actualisé avec un menu et un tutoriel en français, ainsi que des sous-titres dans la séquence finale. Si vous possédez ce titre sur votre Wii, faites un transfert Wii™ vers votre Wii U™ afin d'obtenir la version améliorée à un prix spécial ! Vous pouvez également jouer à ce jeu en japonais. Ceci est la version américaine du jeu.

CA.name: Sin & Punishment™
CA.description: The legendary studio Treasure delivers a high-energy thrill ride gamers recognize as one of the finest Nintendo 64™ titles. On a future Earth starved for resources, a new species engineered for consumption has mutated into monsters. Run, gun, and slash your energy sword through level after level of nonstop destruction to end their reign of terror. Not to be outdone by the action, however, the story line lends the game its soul and draws you even further into the mix. Uncover the intriguing mystery of teenagers Saki and Airan as they go head-to-head with rival groups claiming to protect the Earth. A variety of options and a number of different skill levels are all you’ll have to prepare yourself for the full-blown challenge of Turbo Hard mode. Take a deep breath, gather your energy, and feast your senses on this unforgettable high-speed roller coaster of Sin and Punishment.

CH.name: Sin & Punishment™
CH.description: Ein weiteres Meisterwerk der Spielentwicklung aus dem Hause Treasure, das als eines der großartigsten Shooter aller Zeiten gilt. ES.name: Sin & Punishment™
ES.description: De los genios de Treasure, llega esta obra maestra considerada como uno de los mejores juegos de disparos de la historia. En Sin and Punishment™ te pondrás en la piel de un joven miembro de la resistencia para luchar contra los Ruffians, mutantes criados como alimento y que se han rebelado contra sus amos, además de enfrentarte a militares corruptos para salvar el planeta. Sin and Punishment, publicado inicialmente en exclusiva en Japón para Nintendo 64™, vuelve a estar disponible para la consola virtual. Esta versión del juego ha sido actualizada y se han traducido al inglés el menú, el tutorial y los subtítulos de la escena final. Si posees este título en tu Wii™, puedes realizar una transferencia de datos de Wii a Wii U™ y obtener una actualización a un precio especial. Esta es la versión estadounidense del juego. Este juego también está disponible en japonés.

IT.name: Sin & Punishment™
IT.description: Dalle geniali menti di Treasure, arriva un capolavoro di design diventato nel tempo uno dei più grandi sparatutto di sempre. In Sin and Punishment™ vestirai i panni di un membro della resistenza nella lotta contro i Ruffians, una razza di mutanti allevata come forma di nutrimento e ora ribellatasi ai propri signori. Durante la tua missione per salvare il pianeta, ti troverai inoltre a fronteggiare la frangia corrotta delle forze militari. Rilasciato originalmente solo in Giappone per il Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment è ora disponibile tramite la Virtual Console™ in una versione aggiornata con menu, istruzioni e sottotitoli in inglese nella sequenza finale. Se possiedi questo titolo sulla tua console Wii™, effettua un trasferimento dati su Wii U™ per potere ottenere la versione ottimizzata a un prezzo speciale! Il gioco è disponibile anche in giapponese. Questa è la versione americana del gioco.

MT.name: Sin & Punishment™
MT.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet. Originally released only in Japan for Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment is available once again via Virtual Console™, updated with English menu and tutorial text, and English subtitles in the ending sequence. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This game also supports Japanese. This is the US version of the game.

MX.name: Sin & Punishment™
MX.description: El legendario estudio Treasure propone una emocionante aventura que es reconocida por los jugadores como uno de los mejores juegos para Nintendo 64™. En una Tierra del futuro hambrienta de recursos, una nueva especie creada para ser consumida ha mutado a monstruo. Corre, lanza y usa tu espada a través de niveles llenos de destrucción para detener a los monstruos. La historia es la esencia del juego y aunque no te aparta de la acción, sí consigue sumergirte aún más en el juego. Descubre el misterio intrigante de los jóvenes Saki y Airan mientras se enfrentan con grupos rivales que aseguran querer proteger a la Tierra. Una variedad de opciones y diferentes habilidades es todo lo que tendrás para prepárate para el verdadero desafío del modo Turbo Hard. Respira profundo, reúne energía y diviértete en esta inolvidable aventura de acción.

NO.name: Sin & Punishment™
NO.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet. Originally released only in Japan for Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment is available once again via Virtual Console™, updated with English menu and tutorial text, and English subtitles in the ending sequence. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This game also supports Japanese. This is the US version of the game.

NL.name: Sin & Punishment™
NL.description: De genieën van Treasure hebben een meesterwerk van speldesign gecreëerd, dat nog altijd tot een van de beste schietspellen ooit gerekend kan worden. In Sin and Punishment™ speel je als een jonge verzetsstrijder die de strijd aangaat met Ruffians – mutanten die voor voedsel gefokt worden en zich tegen hun meesters hebben gekeerd – en corrupte militaire strijdkrachten in je missie om de planeet te redden. Het oorspronkelijk alleen in Japan voor de Nintendo 64™ uitgebrachte Sin en Punishment is nu opnieuw verkrijgbaar via Virtual Console™, met Engelstalige menu- en instructietekst, en Engelstalige ondertiteling voor het einde. Als je deze titel hebt gekocht op je Wii™, kom je in aanmerking voor een speciale upgrade-prijs als je je gegevens overzet van Wii naar Wii U™. Dit is de Amerikaanse versie van het spel. Deze game ondersteunt ook Japans.

NZ.name: Sin & Punishment™
NZ.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet. Originally released only in Japan for Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment is available once again via Virtual Console™, updated with English menu and tutorial text, and English subtitles in the ending sequence. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This game also supports Japanese. This is the US version of the game.

PL.name: Sin & Punishment™
PL.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet. Originally released only in Japan for Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment is available once again via Virtual Console™, updated with English menu and tutorial text, and English subtitles in the ending sequence. If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price. This game also supports Japanese. This is the US version of the game.

PT.name: Sin & Punishment™
PT.description: Os génios da Treasure apresentam uma obra-prima do design para videojogos, aquele que é considerado um dos melhores shooters de sempre. Em Sin and Punishment™, assumes o papel de um jovem combatente da resistência que luta contra os Ruffians – mutantes criados como alimento e que se revoltaram contra os seus amos. Enfrentarás também forças militares corruptas na tua missão para salvar o mundo. Originalmente lançado apenas no Japão para a Nintendo 64™, Sin and Punishment volta a estar disponível através da Consola Virtual, atualizado com tutorial e menu em inglês, assim como legendas em inglês na sequência final. Caso já tenha adquirido este título para a sua Wii, faça uma transferência de dados da sua Wii™ para a sua Wii U™ com atualizações a um preço especial. Esta é a versão do jogo para os EUA. Este jogo também está disponível em japonês.

RU.name: Sin & Punishment™
RU.description: От талантливых разработчиков компании Treasure, представляем вам шедевр игрового дизайна, хорошо известного как лучший шутер всех времен. В Sin and Punishment™ вы играете в роли молодого бойца сопротивления, истребляя Ruffians (мутантов, разводимых с целью пищевого употребления, которые восстали против своих создателей), а так же столкнетесь с коррупцией в рядах вооруженных сил на пути к спасению планеты. Изначально вышедшею в продажу только в Японии для системы Nintendo 64™, игра Sin and Punishment теперь доступна для Виртуальной консоли, с обновленными английским текстом меню и секцией обучения игры, а также с английскими субтитрами в заключительном ролике. Если вы приобрели игру на Wii™, вы можете передать ее на консоль Wii U™ и получить скидку на обновление игры до версии Wii U. Эта версия игры предназначена для продажи в США. Эта игра также поддерживает японский язык.

SE.name: Sin & Punishment™
SE.description: From the geniuses at Treasure comes a masterpiece of game design that stands as one of the all-time greatest shooters. Sin and Punishment™ tasks you as a young resistance fighter battling Ruffians – mutants bred for food who turned against their masters – and also facing corrupt military forces in your quest to save the planet.
